title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, December 18, 2019
description: Today is the birthday Charles Wesley (1708), cofounder of Methodism and writer of the Christmas hymn, "Hark! The Herald Angels Sing."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday Charles Wesley (1708), cofounder of Methodism and writer of the Christmas hymn, "Hark! The Herald Angels Sing."
